sentences.en: As the plates spread apart, the lithosphere, or crust, is moved aside like a lid, allowing molten rock from the liquid asthenosphere to seep through.
sentences.cn: 板块分离时，岩石圈或地壳象盖子般移到一旁，液态软流层中的熔岩渗溢而出。

sentences.en: Maginal orogeny was formed on this condition with same relative motion trend between lithosphere and asthenosphere.
sentences.cn: 板缘造山主要表现为岩石圈和软流圈以基本相同的运动趋势的相对运动.

sentences.en: Seamounts form from magmatic eruptions, which occur when lava seeps up to the crust through the partially-melted sub-layer, known as the asthenosphere, in the mantle.
sentences.cn: 火山岩透过地幔中部份熔融的软流层渗入到地壳，岩浆喷发，海山由此形成。

sentences.en: The asthenosphere corresponds approximately to the low - velocity zone.
sentences.cn: 软流圈,大体上相当于低速带.

sentences.en: The mesosphere comprises the rest of the mantle below the asthenosphere.
sentences.cn: 中间圈包括岩流圈以下地幔的其余部分.

sentences.en: The orogenic types were controlled by the relative motion mechanism between lithosphere and asthenosphere.
sentences.cn: 板块和软流圈之间不同的相对运动机制是形成不同类型造山作用的主要原因.

trans.tran_en: a thin semifluid layer of the earth (100
